name: MNML Tower Defence
description:
A short tower defence game made in about 8 hours for BTP jam #3. 

The more towers of the same type you put down, the smaller the radius, which is in keeping with the theme "Less is More".

The style is minimalist, which is the embodiment of "less is more" 🤔

I also spent WAY less time on this than I should have done, so in that way - less time on the game is more winning, right?

Music by Ostrich2401, everything else by me (theChief)
